description: This file defines a React functional component named Navbar that renders a top navigation bar with branding, theme toggling, and user authentication actions.

methods.name: Navbar()
methods.description: React functional component implementing the top navigation bar with theme toggle and logout functionality.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Callback function that toggles the theme between 'light' and 'dark'.

methods.name: onLogout
methods.description: Callback function that logs out the user and navigates to the login page.
